name: test_login_neg_07
description:
TC_ID: LOGIN_NEG_07
Title: Login with password input only
Expected:
    - Error message appears
    - Showed message "Please enter your username."
descriptionHtml:
TC_ID: LOGIN_NEG_07
Title: Login with password input only
Expected:
- Error message appears
- Showed message "Please enter your username."
statusMessage: AssertionError: Error message is different. actual: Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service, expected: Please enter your username.
statusTrace:
browser_chrome = <selenium.webdriver.chrome.webdriver.WebDriver (session="c62e622c33a7f06fd843d5feccaeed71")>
run_timestamp = '2025-10-06_15-05-41'

    def test_login_neg_07(browser_chrome,run_timestamp):
        """
        TC_ID: LOGIN_NEG_07
        Title: Login with password input only
        Expected:
            - Error message appears
            - Showed message "Please enter your username."
        """
        l = LoginPage(browser_chrome)
        l.open()
        l.login_input(" ",Config.PASSWORD)
        take_screenshot(browser_chrome, step_name="input_neg07", run_timestamp=run_timestamp)
        l.login_button()
        # validasi element tampil
        asserts.assert_element_displayed(
            lambda: l.error_message(),
            step_name="Error username null"
        )
        # validasi message error
        actual = l.get_error_message()
        expected = "Please enter your username."
        try:
            asserts.assert_error_contains(actual, expected)
            take_screenshot(browser_chrome, step_name="result_neg07_as expected",run_timestamp=run_timestamp)
        except AssertionError as e:
            take_screenshot(browser_chrome, step_name="result_neg07 _unexpected",run_timestamp=run_timestamp)
>           raise e

actual = 'Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service'
expected = 'Please enter your username.'

    @staticmethod
    def assert_error_contains(actual, expected):
        """
        Verifikasi pesan error sama dengan yang diharapkan.
        """
        if actual == expected:
            print(f"\n✅ Error message passed. actual: {actual}, expected: {expected}")
>       assert actual == expected, f"Error message is different. actual: {actual}, expected: {expected}"
               ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
